title: Life 2.0
overview: Life 2.0 takes a deep and thought-provoking dive into a variety of topics – such as future human life-span, humans colonizing outer space, existing in virtual reality, and more. By interviewing world-class scientists and futurists, such as Dr. Michio Kaku, each half-hour episode reveals mind-blowing scientific breakthroughs… and then asks viewers to consider what these incredible discoveries might mean for their own lives in the future.
